docs.lead_paragraph: The health care overhaul's reach stretches far beyond the millions of uninsured Americans it is expected to help. It also could touch everything from the drug choices to doctor bills of people who have insurance through work.

headline.main: Insurance Through Work? Health Law Affects You Too
headline.print_headline: Insurance Through Work? Health Law Affects You Too
